short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly log your work in this offline time sheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LogIt allows you to quickly log the time spent on different tasks.

This app is for you if you:
- Work on various tasks simultaneously and forget those while filling your time sheets.
- Forget by the weekend the tasks you worked on over the week.
- Hate to wait for timesheet applications to launch.

LogIt helps you overcoming the above problems with features like:

- Remembers your existing tasks and show them as suggestions.
- Easy time entering format. 0.25d or 2h or 120m - All means the same.
- Display your existing tasks in a weekly calendar view (both 5 day & 7 day week supported).
- Configurable work hours in a day.
- Offline app. No internet required.
- Launches quickly. No waiting. Windows users can pin the application to taskbar.
